TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPagedEnumerable`1<T> implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.typeparam: The type of objects to enumerate.
Docs.summary:
Exposes enumerators for a paged collection. These enumerators support simple iteration over a paged collection of a specified type.
Paged collections are backed by one or more calls to the Batch Service. Each of these calls can return a variable sized page of data which is then consumed by the enumerator.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Batch.IPagedEnumerator`1<!T> GetPagedEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an asynchronous enumerator that iterates through the paged collection.
Docs.returns: The type of objects to enumerate.
